biotools.summary: PyGeNN is a Python library for GPU-enhanced neural networks. PyGeNN is a Python package which exposes all of GeNN's functionality to Python with minimal overhead. This provides an alternative, arguably more user-friendly, way of using GeNN and allows modelers to use GeNN within the growing Python-based machine learning and computational neuroscience ecosystems.
